description: Use Bistro Chalk Markers on chalkboards, light boards, windows, windshields, and most non-porous surfaces. A wonderful way to create chalkboard art to attract attention and increase sales. They are opaque, water based, pigmented, erasable with a damp cloth. Each pack includes 4 markers: pale violet, peppermint, blush pink, and pastel peach.
